name: Place_Get
description: Gets the place with the given id.

id.description: The id of the place, you can use the /Place/Types/{types} endpoint to get a list of places for a given type including their ids

includeChildren.description: Defaults to false. If true child places e.g. individual charging stations at a charge point while be included, otherwise just the URLs of any child places will be returned

$ul: **additionalProperties**: A bag of additional key/value pairs with extra information about this place.
**distance**: The distance of the place from its search point, if this is the result
**placeType**: The type of Place. See /Place/Meta/placeTypes for possible values.
**url**: The unique location of this resource.
